mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT p.PRODUCT_ID, p.PRODUCT_TYPE, p.PRODUCT_RATE, p.PRODUCT_DETAIL, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY p.PRODUCT_ID) AS rn FROM PRODUCT p ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_TYPE, PRODUCT_RATE, PRODUCT_DETAIL) VALUES (PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{product_type}, #{product_rate}, #{product_detail})
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_TYPE = #{product_type}, PRODUCT_RATE = #{product_rate}, PRODUCT_DETAIL = #{product_detail} WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{product_id}
